problem_text_cn: 如图,点A,B,C,F,G,H在同一水平线上,DE∥AB,现分别以AB,CD,EF,GH为边长作四个正方形,其中AB=2,CD=3,EF=5,则GH=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the points A, B, C, F, G, and H are on the same horizontal line, DE ∥ AB, now take AB, CD, EF, GH as side lengths to make four squares, where AB = N_0, CD = N_1 , EF = N_2, then GH = ()
raw_answer: 解:作DP⊥AH于P,EQ⊥AH于Q,在Rt△MCB中,BC=√{CM²-BM²}=√{5},∵∠MBC=∠MCP=∠CPD=90°,∴∠MCB=∠CDP,在△MCB和△CDP中,\begin{cases}∠MCB=∠CDP\\∠CBM=∠DPC\\CM=CD\\\end{cases},∴△MCB≌△CDP,∴DP=BC=√{5},∵DP⊥AH,EQ⊥AH,DE∥AB,∴四边形DPQE是矩形,∴EQ=DP=√{5},∴QF=√{EF²-EQ²}=2√{5},同理,△FEQ≌△NFG,∴NG=QF=2√{5},∴GH=2√{5},故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查的是正方形的性质、全等三角形的判定和性质,掌握全等三角形的判定定理和性质定理是解题的关键．
